policy_description: All employees are required to work from 9 AM to 6 PM Monday to Friday.
Employees must mark daily attendance using the official attendance system
Employees are entitled to 12 casual leaves per year
Employees are entitled to 8 sick leaves annually.
All newly joined employees will be on probation for a period of 6 months
Employees are required to serve a notice period of 30 days before resignation
Work from home is allowed with prior approval from the reporting manager
Employees must follow a business casual dress code during working hours
The official company holiday list is applicable to all employees
Salaries are credited on the last working day of every month
All leave requests must be submitted through the HR portal
Employees must maintain professional behavior and follow company ethics
All new employees must complete mandatory onboarding and compliance training
Overtime work is subject to approval and company guidelines
All HR-related communication must be done via official company channels
